data.title: How old is Courteney Cox?
data.meta_description: How old is Courteney Cox? Learn the birthday of Courteney Cox and the exact age in years, months and days, with additional information of the actor.
data.text: Courtney Cox is famous as a lovely Monica from the TV series Friends. She is an American actress and model. She came to this world in Birmingham, Alabama, in 1964. Since her childhood, she has been really lovely and active. As a high school girl, she took part in football team cheerleader squad and loved reading very much, as well as was interested in tennis and swimming. Those were the times when she was dreaming about acting and doing everything possible to focus on making that dream come true. She started her modeling career in Ford agency and premiered as an actress in the movie Down Twisted in 1986. Her most successful movies include Family Ties, Cougar Town, Scream, Ace Ventura, and many others. Her portraying Monica Geller in the famous TV series Friends made a great impact and became the most successful role in her career. She starred in the series alongside Jennifer Aniston, Matthew Perry, David Schwimmer, Matt LeBlanc, and Lisa Kudrow. Courtney Cox was married a few times and has a child. She has recently tried herself as a director and directed a series titled Shining Vale.
